  • Constructor Details

    • DrawingTool

      public DrawingTool(LayerObserver layerObserver, OurCanvas canvas, UndoTool undo)
      Drawing Tool is an abstract class used to represent any Tool that draws into the Canvas
      Parameters:
      layerObserver - a layerObserver is an object that observers changes that happens to the layers structure
      canvas - is the current canvas that holds all the layers
      undo - is the tool that manages how the undo and redo works
